attributes.action: All MPS must house a "refugee" to show true leadership. We're all in it together
attributes.background: Some mps have stated they are willing to do this but will be lying to get there faces in the media  . It will be interesting to see this debated and have them explain why the populace should have social housing stock ,  nhs ,schools and other sevices put under further strain .

rejection.details: This is a decision for individual MPs to make, not a decision for Parliament as a whole.
